content: snip the voodoo doll i set out to create a voodoo doll family snip is the child of stitch & stella each pattern is available separately materials 4 5mm hook worsted weight yarn - base color contrasting stitch & hair color crochet thread or embroidery floss one button felt or random fabric for heart & patch scissors stitch marker yarn needle worked in the round - top-down - uses basic crochet stitches start with base color 1 single_crochet 6 into magic_ring 2 increase around 12 3 increase single_crochet around 18 4 increase single_crochet 2 around 24 5 increase single_crochet 3 around 30 6 increase single_crochet 4 around 36 7 increase single_crochet 5 around 42 8 increase single_crochet 5 around 48 9-16 single_crochet around 8r of 48 17 decrease single_crochet 6 around 42 18 decrease single_crochet 5 around 36 19 decrease single_crochet 4 around 30 20 decrease single_crochet 3 around 24 21 single_crochet around 24 stuff head 22 flo increase single_crochet 3 around 30 23 increase single_crochet 4 around 36 24-35 single_crochet around 12r of 36 36 blo decrease single_crochet 4 around 30 37 decrease single_crochet 3 around 24 38 decrease single_crochet 2 around 18 39 decrease single_crochet around 12 stuff body 40 decrease around 6 close hole weave in end legs - make 2 1 single_crochet 6 into magic_ring 2 increase around 12 3 increase single_crochet around 18 4 blo single_crochet around 18 5 single_crochet around 18 6-11 decrease single_crochet into the rest working one decrease in each round r11 should be 12 single_crochet 12-16 single_crochet around 5r of 12 slip_stitch into next fo leave tail for sewing arms - make 2 1 single_crochet 6 into magic_ring 2 increase around 12 3 increase single_crochet 3 around 15 4 blo single_crochet around 15 5-7 single_crochet around 3r of 15 8 decrease single_crochet 3 around 12 9-14 single_crochet around 6r of 12 slip_stitch into next fo leave taill for sewing assembly stuff arms and legs - sew arms to sides of body sew legs to bottom of body using main stitch color - stitch mouth x eye & random mismatched stitches on arms legs & belly cut two 3-4 inch strands of main stitch color and slip_stitch into top of head to make hair using the floss/thread - sew on single button eye and make stitches across mouth line using felt or fabric cut a small heart and a square using thread sew heart to chest and square patch to backside with big visible stitches
